loan_print.title: Geological collections of the Department of Geology, Tallinn University of Technology
loan_print.title_address: Ehitajate tee 5, 19086 Tallinn, Estonia; phone: +372 6203010; http://taltech.ee/geoloogia-instituut; e-mail: gi@taltech.ee
loan_print.heading_specimen: Shipping invoice of collection specimens No.
loan_print.heading_sample: Shipping invoice of geological samples No.
loan_print.sample_info: The samples listed below are sent to
loan_print.sample_info3: The material will be delivered as
loan_print.specimen_info: The material listed below is sent as a loan
loan_print.specimen_info2: and will be returned to the Department of Geology, Tallinn University of Technology no later than
loan_print.specimen_info3: The material will be delivered as
loan_print.sample_extra: Conditions of using the samples and the data thereof
loan_print.sample_extra1: In case not all material is used for analysis, and there will be residues or preparations (such as acid digestion residues, matrix samples, SEM stubs, thin sections, micropaleontological preparations etc), these should be returned to the Department of Geology, Tallinn University of Technology. We reserve the right to store metadata on these samples in our database and make it freely accessible on-line at
loan_print.sample_extra2: In case of publication, the sample numbers given above must be used, and the Department of Geology, Tallinn University of Technology (abbr. GIT) should be acknowledged for the material. For any fossils deriving from the samples, separate numbers for individuals should be acquired from, and the material returned to the Department of Geology, Tallinn University of Technology. Please notify us upon publication of the results.
loan_print.specimen_extra: Palun tagastage allkirjastatud arve koopia Tallinna Tehnikaülikooli geoloogia osakonda.
loan_print.specimen_extra2: specimen(s) for scientific research and will return them at its expense before
loan_print.specimen_extra3: to the Department of Geology, Tallinn University of Technology.
loan_print.specimen_extra4: It is understood that preparation of the specimens is prohibited unless permission is specifically granted; all products of preparation, e.g., acid preparation residues, matrix samples, SEM stubs, thin sections, are regarded as parts of the specimens and must also be returned.
loan_print.specimen_extra5: In case of publication, the numbers given above must be used, and the Department of Geology, Tallinn University of Technology (abbr. GIT) should be stated as the depository of the specimens.
